text: The Squall is a 1929 American romantic drama movie directed by Alexander Korda and based on the 1926 play of the same name by Jean Bart. It stars Richard Tucker, Alice Joy, Loretta Young, Carroll Nye, Harry Cording, Myrna Loy and was distributed by First National Pictures. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1929 drama movies Category:1920s American romance movies Category:1920s American drama movies Category:1929 romantic drama movies Category:1920s romantic drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Alexander Korda Category:Movies set in Hungary
title: The Squall
